item.title: Exposure Management: The Evolution of Vulnerability Management
item.description:
Traditional Vulnerability Management
As security professionals, we’re tasked with the seemingly impossible job of staying one step ahead of attackers. This task is made more challenging by the constantly evolving threat landscape as well as the silos that exist within our businesses, security teams, and even our tooling.
